narrations: You notice a small mailbox standing solemnly in the open field west of the white house. (Suggestion: Investigate the mailbox.)
You carefully approach the small mailbox, noticing its closed state. (Suggestion: Open the mailbox.)
You unfold the leaflet, discovering a cryptic message scribbled on it. (Suggestion: Read the message carefully.)
You read the cryptic welcome message, feeling a rush of excitement for the adventure ahead. Zork'dicts await. (Suggestion: Decide your next move.)
